job_data.introduction:
Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.


&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.

Project Manager (f/m/d) GMP Bioanalytics

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
job_data.responsibilities:
• Take over the responsibility to lead and manage analytical projects with focus on a GMP-compliant characterization of biopharmaceuticals and vaccines for clients
  • Coordinate qualification and validation projects (analytical method or laboratory equipment) including the compilation of validation plans, protocols and reports
  • Execute analytical as well as general laboratory work as part of a project team lead by himself or in a accordance to provisions by other Project Leaders
  • Take over the lead in the communication with the client (first point of contact) and internally with other project team members and involved Units at Coriolis
  • Ensure that relevant resources are embedded into the project and that project-related decisions are based on state-of-the-art scientific principles
  • Perform project planning, coordination, execution (supported by project team members for laboratory work) and resource management
  • Ensure timely delivery of projects within budget, scope and desired quality
  • Ensure that project deliverables, i.e. experimental plans, experimental data, data presentations and reports are prepared timely and according to the required quality standards
  • Take over the responsibility for interpretation of data and the drawing of final conclusions; compile data presentations and reports
  • Act in the role as a GMP analytical expert (individually with a different focus based on your experience) and provide support to Scientists and Junior Scientists
job_data.qualifications:
• University degree in pharmacy, (bio)chemistry, biology, or related field, PhD beneficial
  • A mininum of 4-5 years of relevant working experience
  • Proven experience in GMP field
  • Subject matter expert in protein analytical methods (HPLC, MFI, LO, UV, DLS)
  • Proven ability in leading drug product development programs
  • Team player with strong motivation and inter-personal skills
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, can-do attitude, and hands on mentality
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and German
job_data.we_offer:
As a Project Manager (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for clients from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide. We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. We actively support your personal development (project management, technical, scientific and personal skills) tailored to your individual development plan. Beyond that Coriolis offers a variety of benefits and team activities to its employees.

Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferences. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning the COVID-19 pandemic, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the physical and mental health and safety of our employees (for example: air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, in-house antigen testing, flexible use of mobile working).

Thank you for your interest! We look forward to receiving your application documents. Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.

Please, visit our website www.coriolis-pharma.com or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!

Fraunhoferstra&szlig;e 18 b, 82152 Martinsried
www.coriolis-pharma.com

job_data.jobtitle: Technischer Assistent (w/m/d) fÃ¼r Zellkultur und Virus- und Zelltherapeutika Analytik
job_data.introduction:
Technischer Assistent (w/m/d) f&uuml;r Zellkultur und Virus- und Zelltherapeutika Analytik

Festanstellung, Vollzeit &middot; Martinsried (BY)&nbsp;

&Uuml;ber uns

Coriolis Pharma ist ein global agierender Dienstleister und einer der Weltmarktf&uuml;hrer in der Formulierungsforschung und -entwicklung von (bio)pharmazeutischen Medikamenten und Impfstoffen.
Wir revolutionieren den Entwicklungsprozess von biopharmazeutischen Arzneimitteln durch die Integration innovativer digitaler Formulierungsans&auml;tze von der Arzneimittelentwicklung bis zum kommerziellen Produkt.
Als mensch- und teamorientiertes Unternehmen mit einem interdisziplin&auml;ren Team hochqualifizierter Wissenschaftler und einem fachkundigen wissenschaftlichen Beirat bieten wir innovative Dienstleistungen und ma&szlig;geschneiderte L&ouml;sungen f&uuml;r unsere Kunden. Unsere Unternehmenskultur basiert auf Vielfalt, Teamarbeit und offener, wertsch&auml;tzender Kommunikation. Deshalb arbeiten bei Coriolis wunderbare Menschen aus &uuml;ber 25 Nationen rund um den Globus erfolgreich zusammen.

Was motiviert uns? Unsere Motivation ist es, durch herausragende biopharmazeutische Forschung die Entwicklung innovativer Medikamente zu erm&ouml;glichen, um die Lebensqualit&auml;t der Menschen zu verbessern.
job_data.responsibilities:
• Zellbiologische Arbeiten (z.B. Standardtechniken der Zellkultivierung)
  • Selbstst&auml;ndige Planung, Durchf&uuml;hrung, Auswertung und Dokumentation von zellbasierten Assays in Mikrotiterplatten (z.B. TCID50)
  • Standard Analysen zur Charakterisierung von Viren, viralen Vektoren oder Impfstoffen (z.B. Partikel-Gr&ouml;&szlig;e, Partikel-Konzentration, Reinheit)
  • Standard Analysen zur Charakterisierung von Zelltherapeutika Produkten (z.B. Sterilit&auml;t, Vitalit&auml;t, Reinheit)
  • Selbstst&auml;ndige Planung, Durchf&uuml;hrung und Auswertung von qPCR Analysen
  • Aufreinigung und Extraktion von RNA und DNA
  • Unterst&uuml;tzung der Projektteams im Labor bei deren T&auml;tigkeiten (z.B. Abf&uuml;llungen, Herstellung von L&ouml;sungen, Probenvorbereitungen)
  • &Uuml;bernahme von organisatorischen Aufgaben im Laborbereich (z.B. Organisation des Warenlagers, Bestellung von Laborchemikalien und Verbrauchsmaterialien, Reinigung und Pflege von Analyseger&auml;ten, Glaswaren und Laboreinrichtung)
  • Dokumentation von Ergebnissen, Verfassen von Arbeitsanweisungen und Versuchspl&auml;nen
job_data.qualifications:
• Technische Ausbildung als CTA, BTA, MTA, Chemielaborant, oder vergleichbare Qualifikation
  • Mehrj&auml;hrige Berufserfahrung im Laborbereich, idealerweise im industriellen Umfeld
  • Profunde Kenntnisse in Zellkultur (Kultivierung von Zellen, Durchf&uuml;hrung zellbasierter Assays) und Molekularbiologie
  • Erfahrung im Umgang mit Mehrkanalpipetten und Arbeiten im 96-Well-Format
  • Erfahrungen in der Virologie speziell mit viralen Vektoren und mit Arbeiten unter biologischer Sicherheitsstufe 2 sind ein Plus
  • Flexibilit&auml;t und Offenheit sich im Bereich neuer Methoden / Verfahren weiterzubilden
  • Schnelle Auffassungsgabe
  • Gewissenhafte, strukturierte, zielorientierte und selbstst&auml;ndige Arbeitsweise
  • Freude an der Arbeit im Team
  • Routine mit Microsoft Word, -Excel und -PowerPoint
  • Gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift sind f&uuml;r uns selbstverst&auml;ndlich
job_data.we_offer:
Wir bieten Ihnen eine abwechslungsreiche T&auml;tigkeit in unserem innovativen, dynamischen und wachsenden Unternehmen. Bei Coriolis Pharma hast Du die M&ouml;glichkeit als Technischer Assistent Deine bisherigen Erfahrungen einzubringen, Verantwortung zu &uuml;bernehmen und im Team mit erfahrenen Kollegen Deinen Aufgabenbereich weiterzuentwickeln. Durch zielgerichtete Qualifizierungsma&szlig;nahmen f&ouml;rdern wir Deine Kompetenzen. Du suchst eine Herausforderung als Technischer Assistent - dann werde Teil unseres Teams. Neben einer leistungsgerechten Verg&uuml;tung und zahlreichen Benefits, bieten wir au&szlig;erdem einen attraktiven Arbeitsplatz am Standort Martinsried.

Coriolis Pharma ist ein Arbeitgeber der Chancengleichheit und begr&uuml;&szlig;t Bewerbungen von allen qualifizierten Personen, unabh&auml;ngig von ethnischer Herkunft, Geschlecht, Nationalit&auml;t oder Geschlechtsidentit&auml;t, Hautfarbe, Behinderung, Religion/Weltanschauung, sexueller Orientierung, Familienstand, Alter oder individuellen Pr&auml;ferenzen. Unterschiedliche Hintergr&uuml;nde, Erfahrungen und Ideen bringen uns weiter und legen die Messlatte h&ouml;her.

Aufgrund der aktuellen Ereignisse im Zusammenhang mit der COVID-19-Pandemie hat Coriolis Pharma verschiedene Ma&szlig;nahmen ergriffen, um die Gesundheit und Sicherheit unserer Arbeitskr&auml;fte zu gew&auml;hrleisten (zum Beispiel: Luftfilter in den B&uuml;ros, kostenlose Masken und Desinfektionsmittel, flexibler Einsatz von mobilem Arbeiten).

Wir danken Dir f&uuml;r Dein Interesse! Wir freuen uns auf die Zusendung Deiner Bewerbungsunterlagen. Bitte nutze hierf&uuml;r ausschlie&szlig;lich unser Karriereportal. Wir m&ouml;chten Dich von Anfang an dabei unterst&uuml;tzen, Deine Entwicklungsm&ouml;glichkeiten hier bei Coriolis zu gestalten.

Bitte besuche unsere Website www.coriolis-pharma.com oder kontaktiere uns direkt f&uuml;r weitere Informationen.

Wir freuen uns auf Deine Bewerbung!

  • Zellbiologische Arbeiten (z.B. Standardtechniken der Zellkultivierung)

job_data.introduction:
Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.


&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.

Junior Scientist &ndash; Biopharmaceutical Analytics

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
job_data.responsibilities:
Scientific Work:
&nbsp;

  • Apply expert knowledge and perform analytical analysis and data interpretation of biological molecules (proteins, peptides, viruses, etc.)
  • Take over responsibility for analytical instruments and methods including biophysical characterization of biopharmaceuticals.
  • Be or develop towards a scientific expert on multiple analytical methods, including Analytical Ultracentrifugation, structural analysis, (sub-)visible particle testing and Pharmacopoeial methods for the characterization of biological molecules
  • Perform data analysis using our own data processing server for SEDFIT or UltraScan ensuring highest quality standards
  • Provide internal scientific consulting for analytical systems to Coriolis Scientists
  • Be a trendsetter, drive innovation and further strengthen our analytical expertise


Project Management:
&nbsp;

  • Perform analytical service for our clients and make sure that clients&rsquo; needs are met
  • Coordinate teams as (deputy) project leader to reach the defined objectives
  • Ensure that projects are executed with highest quality within given timelines and budget

job_data.jobtitle: Postdoctoral Scientist (f/m/d) Formulation and characterization of virus-based ATMPs
job_data.introduction:
Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.


&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.

Postdoctoral Scientist (f/m/d) Formulation and characterization of virus-based ATMPs

Temporary, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
job_data.responsibilities:
• Conduct research in the field of formulation and characterization for virus-based advanced therapy medicinal products (ATMPs), including liquid and freeze-dried formulation studies, stability studies and stress testing of virus formulations
  • Establish protocols and perform analytical characterization of viruses, viral vectors and vaccines from nanometer to the visible size range by using cutting edge technology, e.g. dynamic light scattering (DLS), transmission electron microscopy (TEM), flow imaging microscopy, analytical ultracentrifugation and other methods
  • Establish protocols and perform cell-based assays to quantify biological activity of viruses (e.g. TCID50, plaque assay)
  • Establish protocols and perform Real-time PCR (qPCR) assays to quantify physical virus titers
  • Project planning, project coordination, experimental work (evaluation and implementation of analytical methods), reporting, and communication within the project team
  • Generate scientific output of the project (publications, posters, presentations) and participation at international conferences
  • Be a trendsetter, drive innovation and further strengthen our analytical expertise with focus on virus formulations
job_data.qualifications:
• PhD degree in Life Sciences (virology, biotechnology, pharmacy, pharmaceutical sciences, (bio)chemistry, immunology, or related field)
  • Strong background and profound knowledge in virology, and/or the field of ATMPs, and/or work with viruses, viral vectors and vaccines are mandatory
  • Experience in working under biosafety level 2 (BSL2)
  • Experience in particle characterization and/or handling of cells is a plus
  • High interest in scientific work on a pharmaceutically relevant topic performed in a collaborative setting
  • Ability for critical thinking and implementation of scientific ideas into practice
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, high willingness to learn - hands on mentality
  • Team player with strong motivation, inter-personal skills and excellent communication abilities
job_data.we_offer:
As Postdoctoral Scientist (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for customers from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide.

We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. We actively support your personal development and the realization of your own ideas, i.e. specialization on management or scientific tasks. Beyond that Coriolis offers a variety of benefits and team activities to its employees.


Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferences. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning the COVID-19 pandemic, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the physical and mental health and safety of our employees (for example: air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, in-house antigen testing, flexible use of mobile working).

Thank you for your interest! We look forward to receiving your application documents. Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.

Please, visit our website www.coriolis-pharma.com or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!
&nbsp;

Scientific Reviewer (f/m/d)

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
job_data.responsibilities:
• Provide scientific and technological support for Coriolis&rsquo; project teams in biopharmaceutical formulation development and/or analytical characterization projects:
    • Support project managers during detailed experimental planning and troubleshooting
    • Review of Coriolis&rsquo; documents (e.g. workplans, presentations and reports) in client projects
    • Conduct literature studies
    • Discussion and alignment of data and results in the overall scope/context of the study
    • Take part in meetings and telephone conferences with clients to provide scientific support were needed
  • Provide scientific and technological support of internal research projects at Coriolis
  • Support business development in the scientific assessment of new project requests and the definition of the project strategy
  • Support Coriolis&rsquo; management in scientific questions and strategy
  • Involvement in training and continuing education of Coriolis&rsquo; employees for scientific and technological aspects
  • Representation of Coriolis at conferences
job_data.qualifications:
• PhD degree in pharmacy, pharmaceutical sciences, biochemistry, biophysics, or related field
  • 10+ years experience in drug product development for biopharmaceuticals (protein therapeutics, nucleic acids, ATMPs and/or vaccines)
  • In-depth scientific know-how in the field of formulation development and analytical characterization of biopharmaceuticals
  • Lyophilization expertise and regulatory experience are beneficial for the position
  • Team player with a high intrinsic motivation and enthusiasm for science and innovation
  • Excellent communication skills (in English)
  • Excellent scientific writing skills
job_data.we_offer:
As a Scientific Reviewer (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for clients from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide. In this cross-functional position you will support Coriolis&rsquo; project teams by providing scientific and technological guidance for drug product development projects, with focus on formulation development (liquid and lyophilized) and analytical characterization for biopharmaceuticals, including vaccines and virus-based advanced therapy medicinal products (ATMPs). As a Scientific Reviewer you have the flexibility to work from remote and/or on-site at Coriolis.
We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. We actively support your personal development and the realization of your own ideas, e.g., specialization on management or scientific tasks.

Die ING ist mit &uuml;ber 9 Millionen Kunden die drittgr&ouml;&szlig;te Privatkundenbank in Deutschland.&nbsp;


DevOps Platform Engineer (m/w/d)&nbsp;
am Standort N&uuml;rnberg&nbsp;


Sie verstehen es, aus Problemen Potenziale zu machen, weil Sie leidenschaftlich gerne optimieren, automatisieren und neue Ideen ausprobieren? Und wenn Sie etwas erkl&auml;ren, verstehen alle, wie es richtig geht? Perfekt! Verbinden Sie Dev mit Ops und bringen Sie unsere Microservices-Plattform auf das n&auml;chste Level!
job_data.responsibilities: Tools &amp; Services entwickeln, Methoden &amp; Verfahren optimieren, Konzepte feinjustieren: Sie stecken Ihre kreativen Energien in alle aktuellen Themen, die unsere internen Services in puncto Entwicklung und Betrieb nachhaltig verbessern. Dazu tauchen Sie ein in Container-Technologien, CI / CD und Deployment-Prozesse und anschlie&szlig;end mit schl&uuml;ssigen Konzepten und Verfahrensweisungen wieder auf. Es f&auml;llt Ihnen leicht, andere zu begeistern und anzuleiten? In unserem Centre of Expertise &uuml;bernehmen Sie die Patenschaft f&uuml;r die Themen Microservices &amp; Cloud-Technologien und teilen Wissen und Werte.
job_data.qualifications:
• MINT-Studium oder IT-(technische) Ausbildung
  • Tiefgehendes Verst&auml;ndnis von OpenShift und/oder Azure Cloud samt Service-API&lsquo;s
  • Fundiertes Know-how im Umgang mit Docker und Linux
  • Kenntnisse in mindestens einer Programmiersprache, z. B. Java
  • Vertraut mit Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery
  • Starke kommunikative F&auml;higkeiten
  • Gutes Deutsch und Englisch
job_data.we_offer:
• Betriebliche Altersvorsorge, Verm&ouml;genswirksame Leistungen, regionales Jobticket, Betriebsrestaurant
  • Mobiles Arbeiten je nach Position und Abteilung im Rahmen von betrieblichen, regulatorischen und gesetzlichen Anforderungen, individuelle Arbeitszeitmodelle, Sabbatical, Bezuschussung von Pflege- &amp; Kinderbetreuungskosten
  • Eigene Budgets f&uuml;r pers&ouml;nliche Entwicklung und Gesundheit plus pers&ouml;nliches Ausstattungsbudget f&uuml;r Ihren mobilen Arbeitsplatz
job_data.contact_data: Bewirb Dich jetzt bei Deutschlands drittgr&ouml;&szlig;ter Privatkundenbank: ing.de/karriere

Die ING ist mit &uuml;ber 9 Millionen Kunden die drittgr&ouml;&szlig;te Privatkundenbank in Deutschland.


DevOps Platform Engineer (m/w/d)
am Standort N&uuml;rnberg




Sie verstehen es, aus Problemen Potenziale zu machen, weil Sie leidenschaftlich gerne optimieren, automatisieren und neue Ideen ausprobieren? Und wenn Sie etwas erkl&auml;ren, verstehen alle, wie es richtig geht? Perfekt! Verbinden Sie Dev mit Ops und bringen Sie unsere Microservices-Plattform auf das n&auml;chste Level!

Ihre Aufgaben:

Tools &amp; Services entwickeln, Methoden &amp; Verfahren optimieren, Konzepte feinjustieren: Sie stecken Ihre kreativen Energien in alle aktuellen Themen, die unsere internen Services in puncto Entwicklung und Betrieb nachhaltig verbessern. Dazu tauchen Sie ein in Container-Technologien, CI / CD und Deployment-Prozesse und anschlie&szlig;end mit schl&uuml;ssigen Konzepten und Verfahrensweisungen wieder auf. Es f&auml;llt Ihnen leicht, andere zu begeistern und anzuleiten? In unserem Centre of Expertise &uuml;bernehmen Sie die Patenschaft f&uuml;r die Themen Microservices &amp; Cloud-Technologien und teilen Wissen und Werte.


Ihr Profil:

  • MINT-Studium oder IT-(technische) Ausbildung
  • Tiefgehendes Verst&auml;ndnis von OpenShift und/oder Azure Cloud samt Service-API&lsquo;s
  • Fundiertes Know-how im Umgang mit Docker und Linux
  • Kenntnisse in mindestens einer Programmiersprache, z. B. Java
  • Vertraut mit Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery
  • Starke kommunikative F&auml;higkeiten
  • Gutes Deutsch und Englisch

Wir bieten zahlreiche Benefits

  • Betriebliche Altersvorsorge, Verm&ouml;genswirksame Leistungen, regionales Jobticket, Betriebsrestaurant
  • Mobiles Arbeiten je nach Position und Abteilung im Rahmen von betrieblichen, regulatorischen und gesetzlichen Anforderungen, individuelle Arbeitszeitmodelle, Sabbatical, Bezuschussung von Pflege- &amp; Kinderbetreuungskosten

job_data.jobtitle: Senior Scientist (f/m/d) Lyophilized Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals
job_data.introduction:
Senior Scientist (f/m/d) Lyophilized Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)&nbsp;

About us

Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.


&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.
job_data.responsibilities:
• Contribute scientific expertise
    • Cross functional support for projects teams at Coriolis working on lyophilization projects
    • Provide strategic scientific and technological input into client projects, based on profound experience, best practice and risk mitigation in the field of lyophilization (formulation and process)
    • Give input into experimental planning, support the compilation of workplans and reports
    • Lead, perform and support troubleshooting activities
    • Pass on knowledge to team members and ensure continuous improvement of scientific skills of team members
    • Give internal lectures and trainings at Coriolis
    • Drive implemention of novel technologies and strenghthen scientific expertise in the area of lyophilization
  • Project management
    • Take over the responsibility as project leader, working on client projects with focus on lyophilization of biopharmaceuticals and ATMPs (formulation and lyophilization process development)
    • Project planning, coordination, execution and resource management
    • Ensure that relevant resources are embedded into the project and that project-related decisions are based on state-of-the-art scientific principles
job_data.qualifications:
• University degree in (bio)chemistry, biology, medical sciences pharmacy or related field, PhD beneficial
  • A mininum of 10 years relevant experience
  • Strong scientific background and experience in the field of lyophilization technology
  • Experiences in (bio)pharmaceutical formulation development and characterization
  • Experience in lyophilization under (BL)S2 is of advantage
  • Team player with strong motivation and inter-personal skills
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, can-do attitude and hands on mentality
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and German
job_data.we_offer:

We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. job_data.formatted_html_ad:
Senior Scientist (f/m/d) Lyophilized Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
YOUR JOB
  • Contribute scientific expertise
    • Cross functional support for projects teams at Coriolis working on lyophilization projects
    • Provide strategic scientific and technological input into client projects, based on profound experience, best practice and risk mitigation in the field of lyophilization (formulation and process)
    • Give input into experimental planning, support the compilation of workplans and reports
    • Lead, perform and support troubleshooting activities
    • Pass on knowledge to team members and ensure continuous improvement of scientific skills of team members
    • Give internal lectures and trainings at Coriolis
    • Drive implemention of novel technologies and strenghthen scientific expertise in the area of lyophilization
  • Project management
    • Take over the responsibility as project leader, working on client projects with focus on lyophilization of biopharmaceuticals and ATMPs (formulation and lyophilization process development)
    • Project planning, coordination, execution and resource management
    • Ensure that relevant resources are embedded into the project and that project-related decisions are based on state-of-the-art scientific principles
WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED
  • University degree in (bio)chemistry, biology, medical sciences pharmacy or related field, PhD beneficial
  • A mininum of 10 years relevant experience
  • Strong scientific background and experience in the field of lyophilization technology
  • Experiences in (bio)pharmaceutical formulation development and characterization
  • Experience in lyophilization under (BL)S2 is of advantage
  • Team player with strong motivation and inter-personal skills
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, can-do attitude and hands on mentality
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and German
WHY TO JOIN CORIOLIS?
As a Senior Scientist (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for clients from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide. We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. We actively support your personal development (technical, scientific and personal skills) especially by training on relevant techniques for characterization of (bio)pharmaceuticals. Beyond that Coriolis offers a variety of benefits and team activities to its employees.

Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferences. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.
Due to the current events concerning the COVID-19 pandemic, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the physical and mental health and safety of our employees (for example: air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, in-house antigen testing, flexible use of mobile working).
Thank you for your interest! We look forward to receiving your application documents. Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.
Please, visit our website www.coriolis-pharma.com or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!

Scientific Application Specialist (f/m/d)

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
job_data.responsibilities:
Our Mission
In the Data Science Unit, we are implementing the scientific IT infrastructure to match our future ambitions within the field of data science. The solution includes a LIMS, automated data parsers for simple and analytical instruments, and a data visualization tool. As we are approaching the operational phase, we are now looking to hire a second Scientific Application Specialist (f/m/d) to join the team.

YOUR JOB

  • Supporting users, you will help ensure a smooth roll-out of the platform;
  • by creating, testing, and maintaining data parsers, you will help ensure a high-performing analytics platform.
  • You document your work and create procedures to create a robust, future-proof IT solution.
  • You optimize the platform by listening to users&rsquo; requirement and - together with the LIMS vendor &ndash;configure the solution to fit the business&rsquo; needs.
  • You ensure the platform is running smoothly; and
  • you are responsible for administration of accesses and roles, and other administrative master data.
job_data.qualifications:
• You have a background in IT management, computer science, life science informatics, or similar discipline.
  • You have experience with LIMS and sample management from a CRO, biotech, or pharmaceutical company
  • You communicate clearly in English
  • You have a strategic mindset and enjoy staying up-to-date on new technologies
  • You enjoy implementing new technologies and you like to support other people
  • Good documentation practice is part of your DNA
  • Experience with data visualization, data analysis, and programming is considered an advantage but not a must (e.g., Spotfire, R, Python)
  • Experience from working in a GxP environment is beneficial but not required
job_data.we_offer:
As Scientific Application Specialist (f/m/d) you will join a highly motivated, international team on a journey towards a modern data-science infrastructure. We love new technologies and putting them in the hands of highly skilled scientists is what we strive for. The position offers diverse tasks, which ensure that no two days are alike as well as the unique opportunity to shape a growing scientific IT organization. We actively support your personal development; especially by training in relevant technologies and participation in conferences. Beyond that, Coriolis offers a variety of benefits &ndash; including flexible workhours &ndash; and team activities to its employees. We are located in the southern part of Munich and due to the nature of the job you are expected to work mostly on-site.

Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferences. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning the COVID-19 pandemic, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the physical and mental health and safety of our employees (for example: air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, in-house antigen testing, flexible use of mobile working).

Thank you for your interest! We look forward to receiving your application documents. Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.

Please, visit our website www.coriolis-pharma.com or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!

PURPOSE OF YOUR JOB

In the Data Science Unit, we are implementing the scientific IT infrastructure to match our future ambitions within the field of data science. The solution includes a LIMS, automated data parsers for simple and analytical instruments, and a data visualization tool. As we are approaching the operational phase, we are now looking to hire a Data Visualization Specialist (f/m/d).
job_data.responsibilities:
In the role, you will be responsible for making data from analytical instruments and the LIMS sample database available to scientists in Spotfire. You will help create analytical solutions to provide new insights into our instrument data, and by combining data sources you will help create predictions.
Your other tasks include:
&nbsp;

  • Designing, developing, and maintaining user-friendly data visualizations and dashboards using datasets from various data sources.
  • Implement best practices to ensure dashboard design consistency for the best user experience across projects.
  • Gather user requirements and implement analytical solutions using TERR, Iron Python, and JavaScript.
  • Debugging applications, tracing code, and fixing bugs.
  • Testing and documenting your code.
  • Creating training material and delivering end-user training.
  • Providing technical support to users on a daily basis.
  • Manage access rights to dashboards based on roles and projects.
job_data.qualifications:
• Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in statistics, math, engineering, business, or finance, along with at least two years of relevant experience
  • Strong knowledge and hands-on experience with SQL
  • Experience with installing, maintaining, and administering Spotfire or similar tool.
  • Experience with database administration, SSIS, Confluence, and Jira Service Management is considered favorable but not a requirement.

job_data.jobtitle: Project Manager (f/m/d) Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals
job_data.introduction:
Project Manager (f/m/d) Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)&nbsp;

About us

Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.


&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.
job_data.responsibilities:
• Take over the responsibility to lead and manage drug product development projects with focus on formulation development (liquid and/or lyophilized) for biopharmaceuticals and vaccines for clients
  • Take over the lead in the communication with the client (first point of contact) and internally with other project team members and involved units at Coriolis
  • Ensure that relevant resources are embedded into the project and that project-related decisions are based on state-of-the-art scientific principles
  • Perform project planning, coordination, execution (supported by project team members for laboratory work) and resource management
  • Ensure timely delivery of projects within budget, scope and desired quality
  • Ensure that project deliverables, i.e. experimental plans, experimental data, data presentations and reports are prepared timely and according to the required quality standards
  • Take over the responsibility for interpretation of data and the drawing of final conclusions; compile data presentations and reports
  • Act in the role as a drug product development expert (individually with a different focus based on your experience) and provide support to scientists and junior scientists
job_data.qualifications:
• University degree in pharmacy, (bio)chemistry, biology, or related field, PhD beneficial
  • A mininum of 4-5 years of relevant working experience
  • Proven ability in leading drug product development programs
  • Profound expert / scientific knowledge in liquid and/or lyophilization formulation development and analytical characterization of biophamaceuticals
  • Team player with strong motivation and inter-personal skills
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, can-do attitude and hands on mentality
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and German
job_data.we_offer:
As a Project Manager (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for clients from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide. job_data.jobtitle: Scientist (f/m/d) Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals
job_data.introduction:
Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.

Scientist (f/m/d) Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
job_data.responsibilities:
• Support/lead project teams for the pharmaceutical drug product development of biopharmaceuticals
  • Plan and execute CMC activities of biopharmaceuticals, including formulation preparation and development, forced degradation study, stability and comparability testing, primary packaging selection, optimization of lyophilization processes, robustness investigations, scale-up and transfer, etc.
  • Perform analytical method development, characterization and evaluation of biopharmaceuticals
  • Data analysis of analytical results, support of reporting activities
  • Communication and reporting with our customers
  • System ownership of analytical equipment (e.g. maintenance activities)
job_data.qualifications:
• University degree in pharmacy, pharmaceutical sciences, (bio)chemistry, chemical engineering, or related field
  • A minimum of 3 years relevant experience
  • Strong scientific background and experience in the field of biopharmaceutical characterization and analysis
  • Experience in the field of protein/oligonucleotide liquid and/or lyophilization formulation development and formulation preparation technology is advantagous
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, high willingness to learn - hands on mentality
  • Team player with strong motivation, inter-personal skills and excellent communication abilities
job_data.we_offer:
As Scientist (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for customers from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide.

We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. We actively support your personal development (technical, scientific and personal skills) especially by training on relevant techniques for characterization of (bio)pharmaceuticals. Beyond that Coriolis offers a variety of benefits and team activities to its employees.


Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferences. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning the COVID-19 pandemic, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the physical and mental health and safety of our employees (for example: air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, in-house antigen testing, flexible use of mobile working).

We are looking forward to your application!

job_data.formatted_html_ad:
Scientist (f/m/d) Drug Product Development for Biopharmaceuticals

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)
YOUR JOB
  • Support/lead project teams for the pharmaceutical drug product development of biopharmaceuticals
  • Plan and execute CMC activities of biopharmaceuticals, including formulation preparation and development, forced degradation study, stability and comparability testing, primary packaging selection, optimization of lyophilization processes, robustness investigations, scale-up and transfer, etc.
  • Perform analytical method development, characterization and evaluation of biopharmaceuticals
  • Data analysis of analytical results, support of reporting activities
  • Communication and reporting with our customers
  • System ownership of analytical equipment (e.g. maintenance activities)
WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED
  • University degree in pharmacy, pharmaceutical sciences, (bio)chemistry, chemical engineering, or related field
  • A minimum of 3 years relevant experience
  • Strong scientific background and experience in the field of biopharmaceutical characterization and analysis
  • Experience in the field of protein/oligonucleotide liquid and/or lyophilization formulation development and formulation preparation technology is advantagous
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, high willingness to learn - hands on mentality
  • Team player with strong motivation, inter-personal skills and excellent communication abilities
WHY TO JOIN CORIOLIS?
As Scientist (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for customers from the (bio)pharmaceutical industry worldwide.
We offer you diversified and challenging areas of responsibilities in our innovative company. We actively support your personal development (technical, scientific and personal skills) especially by training on relevant techniques for characterization of (bio)pharmaceuticals. Beyond that Coriolis offers a variety of benefits and team activities to its employees.

Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferences. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning the COVID-19 pandemic, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the physical and mental health and safety of our employees (for example: air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, in-house antigen testing, flexible use of mobile working).

Thank you for your interest! We look forward to receiving your application documents. Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.

Please, visit our website www.coriolis-pharma.com or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!

Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.

job_data.responsibilities:

As a Junior Scientist (f/m/d), you will join a highly motivated, interdisciplinary team performing contract research and development for customers from the (bio) pharmaceutical industry worldwide.

YOUR JOB

  • Support project teams for the pharmaceutical drug product development of biopharmaceuticals
  • Formulation development activities (e.g., preparation of liquid and/or freeze-dried samples for (pre)formulation study)
  • Analytical characterization of liquid and/or freeze-dried samples with respect to quality attributes
  • Perform data analysis, support of reporting activities
  • Internal discussion of data within the project team
  • Participation in meetings, also with our international customers
  • System ownership of analytical equipment (e.g. maintenance activities)

• University degree in a related field (biotechnology, pharmacy, (bio)chemistry, chemical engineering, biology etc.)
  • Preferably experience in the field of protein formulation (liquid or lyophilization products) and protein analytics
  • Team player with strong motivation, inter-personal skills and excellent communication abilities
  • Open for new ideas and tasks, high willingness to learn

job_data.introduction:
Manager Business Development (f/m/d)

Permanent employee, Full-time &middot; Martinsried (BY)

PURPOSE OF YOUR JOB

Our &ldquo;Business Development (BD) - Unit is looking for a new colleague, who wants to be part of our team in Martinsried close to Munich (remote possible).
The future position holder ensures further development and increase in sales of Coriolis business activities regarding liquid and/or lyophilized biopharmaceutical formulation development on national and/ or international level.

YOUR JOB

  • Develop and grow sales and business development activities for liquid and/or lyophilized biopharmaceutical formulation development (proteins, nucleic acids, peptides, viruses/Vaccines, VLPs cell &amp; gene therapies) / Develop new business opportunities and demonstrate active customer interaction
    • Identify and qualify prospective customers
    • Build relationships with potential customers and strengthen the relationships with the existing customers
    • Understand the business needs of these companies and use the opportunity to present our services to the customers
    • Proactively develop and lead strategic account-planning activities for individual key accounts
  • Create offers and concepts for customers including
    • Participation in technical / scientific discussion
    • Deep scientific expertise and understanding of the field
  • Leading contract negotiations (IP, liability and payments) and pricing in close cooperation with the customer
  • Act as interface to internal and external stakeholders
    • Proactively and reactively assess customer needs and develop solutions within the company to respond to these needs by coordinating internal resources and involving company personnel
    • Ensure customer satisfaction
    • Ensure satisfaction of project team members and other stakeholders e.g. accounting
  • Initiation, planning, leading and execution of projects to reach strategic company goals
  • Ensure utilization of business units
  • Observation of the global industry and development of new technologies
  • Evaluation of the market opportunities of own products and services
  • Development and maintenance of a tight network to opinion maker and other biotechnological and pharmaceutical companies
  • Strategical planning and execution of sales and marketing activities incl. creation, revision and collection of relevant content in close collaboration with marketing manager
  • Represent Coriolis during customer visits, conferences and roadshows (globally)

WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED

  • University degree, preferably in a scientific area (pharmacy, biology, biotechnology, chemistry)
  • Further training in business administration and/or marketing and sales preferred &amp; preferably with an additional MBA in an applied science or engineering field
  • Minimum 5 &ndash; 8 years professional experience in Scientific / Pharma / Biopharmaceutical environment
  • Project management experience - able to juggle multiple competing priorities
  • Experience in lyophilization and liquid formulation development
  • Good team player - an energetic and dynamic relationship builder
  • Excellent communication &amp; presentation skills
  • Good English skills (Business fluent)
  • Willingness to travel

INVEST IN YOURSELF

  • Ownership: All team members are empowered to bring ideas, make decisions and have impact. Participate in our equity program and share in our success.
  • Transparency: Everyone at Coriolis is regularly updated on strategic progress, KPI tracking, product updates and changes.
  • Growth: Not only will you grow in your role, you also have access to our people development budget.
  • Flexibility: Work on your terms, by leveraging our hybrid-office arrangement. No minimums or maximums.

WHY TO JOIN CORIOLIS?

Why to join Coriolis
Let&rsquo;s formulate innovation together&hellip;
Our success &amp; development is created by the people working together @Coriolis. We put People first! That&rsquo;s why we have a growth mindset, and value personality, collaboration and community to create an empowering and inspiring working space with focus on quality and costumers.

We would like to grow together with you!
Let&rsquo;s continue building and creating the future now and join our Team of currently around 140 employees. In a highly motivated and interdisciplinary team, we provide you with a great chance to increase your experience. We offer an attractive work space at the Martinsried site. Let&rsquo;s make a difference together!

Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferencies. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning COVID-19, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the phyical and mental health and safety of our employees (Air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, flexible use of moblie working).

Thank you for your interest! Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.
For more information, please visit www.coriolis-pharma.com. or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!

People Organization and Culture Unit

Dominik Schwemmer
Talent Acquisition Manager
Coriolis Pharma Research GmbH
Phone: +49 (0) 89 &ndash; 417760 - 293
Fraunhoferstra&szlig;e 18 b, 82152 Martinsried
www.coriolis-pharma.com

    • Build relationships with potential customers and strengthen the relationships with the existing customers
    • Understand the business needs of these companies and use the opportunity to present our services to the customers
    • Proactively develop and lead strategic account-planning activities for individual key accounts
  • Create offers and concepts for customers including
    • Participation in technical / scientific discussion
    • Deep scientific expertise and understanding of the field
  • Leading contract negotiations (IP, liability and payments) and pricing in close cooperation with the customer
  • Act as interface to internal and external stakeholders
    • Proactively and reactively assess customer needs and develop solutions within the company to respond to these needs by coordinating internal resources and involving company personnel
    • Ensure customer satisfaction
    • Ensure satisfaction of project team members and other stakeholders e.g. accounting
  • Initiation, planning, leading and execution of projects to reach strategic company goals
  • Ensure utilization of business units
  • Observation of the global industry and development of new technologies
  • Evaluation of the market opportunities of own products and services
  • Development and maintenance of a tight network to opinion maker and other biotechnological and pharmaceutical companies
  • Strategical planning and execution of sales and marketing activities incl. creation, revision and collection of relevant content in close collaboration with marketing manager
  • Represent Coriolis during customer visits, conferences and roadshows (globally)

WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED

  • University degree, preferably in a scientific area (pharmacy, biology, biotechnology, chemistry)
  • Further training in business administration and/or marketing and sales preferred &amp; preferably with an additional MBA in an applied science or engineering field
  • Minimum 5 &ndash; 8 years professional experience in Scientific / Pharma / Biopharmaceutical environment
  • Project management experience - able to juggle multiple competing priorities
  • Experience in lyophilization and liquid formulation development
  • Good team player - an energetic and dynamic relationship builder
  • Excellent communication &amp; presentation skills
  • Good English skills (Business fluent)
  • Willingness to travel

INVEST IN YOURSELF

  • Ownership: All team members are empowered to bring ideas, make decisions and have impact. Participate in our equity program and share in our success.
  • Transparency: Everyone at Coriolis is regularly updated on strategic progress, KPI tracking, product updates and changes.
  • Growth: Not only will you grow in your role, you also have access to our people development budget.
  • Flexibility: Work on your terms, by leveraging our hybrid-office arrangement. No minimums or maximums.

WHY TO JOIN CORIOLIS?

Why to join Coriolis
Let&rsquo;s formulate innovation together&hellip;
Our success &amp; development is created by the people working together @Coriolis. We put People first! That&rsquo;s why we have a growth mindset, and value personality, collaboration and community to create an empowering and inspiring working space with focus on quality and costumers.

We would like to grow together with you!
Let&rsquo;s continue building and creating the future now and join our Team of currently around 140 employees. In a highly motivated and interdisciplinary team, we provide you with a great chance to increase your experience. We offer an attractive work space at the Martinsried site. Let&rsquo;s make a difference together!

Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferencies. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.

Due to the current events concerning COVID-19, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the phyical and mental health and safety of our employees (Air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, flexible use of moblie working).

Thank you for your interest! Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis.
For more information, please visit www.coriolis-pharma.com. or contact us directly for further information.

We are looking forward to your application!

People Organization and Culture Unit

Dominik Schwemmer
Talent Acquisition Manager
Coriolis Pharma Research GmbH
Phone: +49 (0) 89 &ndash; 417760 - 293
Fraunhoferstra&szlig;e 18 b, 82152 Martinsried
www.coriolis-pharma.com

About us

Coriolis Pharma, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.
We revolutionize the development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products.

As a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.

Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.


&nbsp;

What motivates us? Our motivation is to enable the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical research to improve the quality of life for humankind.

Apply now

<body class="body-container">
<div class="container detail-wrapper">
<div class="publish-preview-header">
<h2 class="detail-title">Manager Business Development (f/m/d)</h2>
<h6 class="detail-subtitle">
<span>
                    Permanent employee,                             Full-time
                            &amp;middot; Martinsried (BY)
            </span>
</h6>
</div>
<div class="detail-content collapse show" id="job-details">
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-tasks">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">PURPOSE OF YOUR JOB </h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
                Our &amp;ldquo;Business Development (BD) - Unit is looking for a new colleague, who wants to be part of our team in Martinsried close to Munich (remote possible).<br/>The future position holder ensures further development and increase in sales of Coriolis business activities regarding liquid and/or lyophilized biopharmaceutical formulation development on national and/ or international level<strong>.</strong>
</div>
</article>
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-conditions">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">YOUR JOB</h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
<ul><li>Develop and grow sales and business development activities for liquid and/or lyophilized biopharmaceutical formulation development (proteins, nucleic acids, peptides, viruses/Vaccines, VLPs cell &amp;amp; gene therapies) / Develop new business opportunities and demonstrate active customer interaction<ul><li>Identify and qualify prospective customers</li><li>Build relationships with potential customers and strengthen the relationships with the existing customers</li><li>Understand the business needs of these companies and use the opportunity to present our services to the customers</li><li>Proactively develop and lead strategic account-planning activities for individual key accounts </li></ul></li><li>Create offers and concepts for customers including<ul><li>Participation in technical / scientific discussion</li><li>Deep scientific expertise and understanding of the field  </li></ul></li><li>Leading contract negotiations (IP, liability and payments) and pricing in close cooperation with the customer </li><li>Act as interface to internal and external stakeholders<ul><li>Proactively and reactively assess customer needs and develop solutions within the company to respond to these needs by coordinating internal resources and involving company personnel </li><li>Ensure customer satisfaction</li><li>Ensure satisfaction of project team members and other stakeholders e.g. accounting</li></ul></li><li>Initiation, planning, leading and execution of projects to reach strategic company goals </li><li>Ensure utilization of business units</li><li>Observation of the global industry and development of new technologies</li><li>Evaluation of the market opportunities of own products and services</li><li>Development and maintenance of a tight network to opinion maker and other biotechnological and pharmaceutical companies </li><li>Strategical planning and execution of sales and marketing activities incl. creation, revision and collection of relevant content in close collaboration with marketing manager </li><li>Represent Coriolis during customer visits, conferences and roadshows (globally)</li></ul>
</div>
</article>
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-conditions">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">WHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEED</h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
<ul><li>University degree, preferably in a scientific area (pharmacy, biology, biotechnology, chemistry)</li><li>Further training in business administration and/or marketing and sales preferred &amp;amp; preferably with an additional MBA in an applied science or engineering field</li><li>Minimum 5 &amp;ndash; 8 years professional experience in Scientific / Pharma / Biopharmaceutical environment</li><li>Project management experience - able to juggle multiple competing priorities </li><li>Experience in lyophilization and liquid formulation development</li><li>Good team player - an energetic and dynamic relationship builder </li><li>Excellent communication &amp;amp; presentation skills</li><li>Good English skills (Business fluent)</li><li>Willingness to travel</li></ul>
</div>
</article>
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-conditions">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">INVEST IN YOURSELF</h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
<ul><li style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:14px;"><span style="line-height:150%;color:rgb(64,64,64);"><strong>Ownership</strong>: All team members are empowered to bring ideas, make decisions and have impact. Participate in our equity program and share in our success. </span></li><li style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:14px;"><span style="line-height:150%;color:rgb(64,64,64);"><strong>Transparency:</strong> Everyone at Coriolis is regularly updated on strategic progress, KPI tracking, product updates and changes. </span></li><li style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:14px;"><span style="line-height:150%;color:rgb(64,64,64);"><strong>Growth:</strong> Not only will you grow in your role, you also have access to our people development budget. </span></li><li style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;font-size:14px;"><span style="line-height:150%;color:rgb(64,64,64);"><strong>Flexibility:</strong> Work on your terms, by leveraging our hybrid-office arrangement. No minimums or maximums. </span></li></ul>
</div>
</article>
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-conditions">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">WHY TO JOIN CORIOLIS?</h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
<strong><u>Why to join Coriolis</u></strong><br/><strong>Let&amp;rsquo;s formulate innovation together&amp;hellip;</strong><br/>Our success &amp;amp; development is created by the people working together @Coriolis. We put People first! That&amp;rsquo;s why we have a growth mindset, and value personality, collaboration and community to create an empowering and inspiring working space with focus on quality and costumers. <br/><strong> </strong><br/><strong>We would like to grow together with you!</strong><br/>Let&amp;rsquo;s continue building and creating the future now and join our Team of currently around 140 employees. In a highly motivated and interdisciplinary team, we provide you with a great chance to increase your experience. We offer an attractive work space at the Martinsried site. Let&amp;rsquo;s make a difference together!<br/> <br/>Coriolis Pharma is an equal opportunity employer and welcomes applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, sex, citizenship or gender identity, color, disability, religion/belief, sexual orientation, marital status, age or individual preferencies. Different backgrounds, experiences and ideas push us further and raise the bar.<br/> <br/>Due to the current events concerning COVID-19, Coriolis Pharma has implemented different measures to ensure the phyical and mental health and safety of our employees (Air filter in offices, free masks and disinfectants, flexible use of moblie working).<br/> <br/>Thank you for your interest! Please use our career portal exclusively for this purpose. We would like to support you from the very beginning to shape your development possibilities here at Coriolis. <br/>For more information, please visit www.coriolis-pharma.com. or contact us directly for further information.<br/><br/> <strong>We are looking forward to your application!</strong>
</div>
</article>
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-conditions">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">People Organization and Culture Unit</h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
<strong>Dominik Schwemmer</strong><br/>Talent Acquisition Manager<br/>Coriolis Pharma Research GmbH<br/>Phone: +49 (0) 89 &amp;ndash; 417760 - 293<br/>Fraunhoferstra&amp;szlig;e 18 b, 82152 Martinsried<br/>www.coriolis-pharma.com
                </div>
</article>
<article class="detail-content-block detail-content-block-about-us">
<h5 class="detail-block-title">About us</h5>
<div class="detail-block-description">
<p style="margin:0cm;text-align:justify;background:#FFFFFF;"><strong><em>Coriolis Pharma</em></strong><em>, is a globally operating service provider and one of the world leaders in formulation research and development of (bio)pharmaceutical drugs and vaccines.</em><em><br/><em>We revolutionize the  development process of biopharmaceutical drugs by integrating innovative  digital formulation approaches from drug development to commercial products. </em></em></p><p style="margin:0cm;text-align:justify;background:#FFFFFF;"><em><em>As  a people and team-oriented company with an interdisciplinary team of highly  skilled scientists and an expert scientific advisory board, we provide  cutting-edge services and tailor-made solutions for our clients.</em></em></p><p style="margin:0cm;text-align:justify;background:#FFFFFF;"><em>Our company culture is based on diversity, teamwork and open and appreciative communication. That's why wonderful people from over 25 nations around the world work together successfully at Coriolis.</em></p><br/><p style="margin:0cm;text-align:justify;background:#FFFFFF;color:rgba(0,0,0,0.9);"><strong style="line-height:inherit;"><em>What motivates us? </em></strong><em>Our motivation is to enable  the development of innovative drugs by performing outstanding biopharmaceutical  research to improve the quality of life for humankind.</em></p>
</div>
</article>
</div>

job_data.introduction:
Die Medizinische Hochschule&nbsp; Hannover (MHH), mit rund 10.000 Besch&auml;ftigten gr&ouml;&szlig;ter Landesbetrieb des Landes Niedersachsen, ist eine universit&auml;re Einrichtung f&uuml;r Forschung und Lehre in der Human- und Zahnmedizin und ein Universit&auml;tsklinikum der Supramaximalversorgung. Forschung, Lehre, Krankenversorgung und Administration arbeiten im Integrationsmodell auf dem MHH-Campus Hand in Hand.

Institutsleitung: Prof. Dr. Rainer Blasczyk
job_data.responsibilities: Ihre Aufgaben im Bereich der Immunh&auml;matologie liegen in der pr&auml;- und posttransfusionellen Diagnostik und umfassen moderne serologische Verfahren zur Durchf&uuml;hrung von Blutgruppenbestimmungen, serologischen Vertr&auml;glichkeitsuntersuchungen, Antik&ouml;rpersuchtesten und &nbsp;Antik&ouml;rperidentifizierungen des Management von Blutprodukten sowie die Mitarbeit in der Blutdepotverwaltung. Die T&auml;tigkeit schlie&szlig;t Bereitschaftsdienste, Rufbereitschaften sowie Nacht-, Feiertags- und Wochenenddienste ein.
job_data.qualifications:
Bewerberinnen und Bewerber m&uuml;ssen zwingend &uuml;ber eine abgeschlossene MTLA - Ausbildung verf&uuml;gen. Verantwortungsbereitschaft, Teamf&auml;higkeit und Belastbarkeit sollten zu Ihren St&auml;rken z&auml;hlen. Immunh&auml;matologische Grundkenntnisse w&auml;ren von Vorteil. Dar&uuml;ber hinaus w&uuml;nschen wir uns Erfahrung im Umgang mit Standard-PC Anwendungen und Laborinformationssystemen.
&nbsp;
job_data.we_offer:
Wir bieten Ihnen eine interessante und verantwortungsvolle Aufgabe in einem motivierten Team sowie einem attraktiven Umfeld mit moderner Laborausstattung. Die Verg&uuml;tung erfolgt je nach den pers&ouml;nlichen Voraussetzungen. Es handelt sich um eine unbefristete Vollzeitstelle mit 38,5 h in der Woche.

Eine kollegiale Einarbeitung und vielf&auml;ltige Weiterbildungs- und Entwicklungsm&ouml;glichkeiten sowie ein umfangreiches Gesundheitsprogramm f&uuml;r Besch&auml;ftigte wird Ihnen erm&ouml;glicht. Zudem gibt es vielf&auml;ltige Familienunterst&uuml;tzung und eine Kindertagesst&auml;tte mit Notfallkinderbetreuung. Dar&uuml;ber hinaus werden die &uuml;blichen sozialen Leistungen des &ouml;ffentlichen Dienstes geboten.

Die MHH ist zertifizierte familiengerechte Hochschule und setzt sich f&uuml;r die F&ouml;rderung von Frauen im Berufsleben ein. Bewerbungen von Frauen sind besonders erw&uuml;nscht. Schwerbehinderte Bewerberinnen und Bewerber werden bei gleicher Qualifikation bevorzugt ber&uuml;cksichtigt.
job_data.contact_data:
Claudia van Deventer
+49 511 532 6701
&nbsp;

Bewerben Sie sich jetzt

Kennziffer 1193&nbsp;
Bewerbungsfrist: 31.03.2022

&nbsp;

Als universit&auml;re Spitzenklinik geh&ouml;ren wir zu den Besten. Wir sind f&uuml;hrend in Wissenschaft, Forschung und Lehre, ebenso in der Behandlung unserer Patientinnen und Patienten. Neben sinnvoller Arbeit f&uuml;r den Menschen bieten wir vor allem Raum f&uuml;r Engagement und Weiterentwicklungen. Wir sorgen f&uuml;r attraktive Arbeitsbedingungen und aktive Unterst&uuml;tzung f&uuml;r unsere Besch&auml;ftigten, sowie die Zugeh&ouml;rigkeit zu einem starken Team. Jeden Tag. "Jeden Tag f&uuml;r das Leben"
job_data.formatted_html_ad:
Institut f&uuml;r Transfusionsmedizin und Transplantat Engineering

MTA (w/d/m)

Die Medizinische Hochschule&nbsp; Hannover (MHH), mit rund 10.000 Besch&auml;ftigten gr&ouml;&szlig;ter Landesbetrieb des Landes Niedersachsen, ist eine universit&auml;re Einrichtung f&uuml;r Forschung und Lehre in der Human- und Zahnmedizin und ein Universit&auml;tsklinikum der Supramaximalversorgung. Forschung, Lehre, Krankenversorgung und Administration arbeiten im Integrationsmodell auf dem MHH-Campus Hand in Hand.
Institutsleitung: Prof. Dr. Rainer Blasczyk

Ihre Aufgaben im Bereich der Immunh&auml;matologie liegen in der pr&auml;- und posttransfusionellen Diagnostik und umfassen moderne serologische Verfahren zur Durchf&uuml;hrung von Blutgruppenbestimmungen, serologischen Vertr&auml;glichkeitsuntersuchungen, Antik&ouml;rpersuchtesten und &nbsp;Antik&ouml;rperidentifizierungen des Management von Blutprodukten sowie die Mitarbeit in der Blutdepotverwaltung. Die T&auml;tigkeit schlie&szlig;t Bereitschaftsdienste, Rufbereitschaften sowie Nacht-, Feiertags- und Wochenenddienste ein.

Bewerberinnen und Bewerber m&uuml;ssen zwingend &uuml;ber eine abgeschlossene MTLA - Ausbildung verf&uuml;gen. Verantwortungsbereitschaft, Teamf&auml;higkeit und Belastbarkeit sollten zu Ihren St&auml;rken z&auml;hlen. Immunh&auml;matologische Grundkenntnisse w&auml;ren von Vorteil. Dar&uuml;ber hinaus w&uuml;nschen wir uns Erfahrung im Umgang mit Standard-PC Anwendungen und Laborinformationssystemen.

Wir bieten Ihnen eine interessante und verantwortungsvolle Aufgabe in einem motivierten Team sowie einem attraktiven Umfeld mit moderner Laborausstattung. Die Verg&uuml;tung erfolgt je nach den pers&ouml;nlichen Voraussetzungen. Es handelt sich um eine unbefristete Vollzeitstelle mit 38,5 h in der Woche.

Eine kollegiale Einarbeitung und vielf&auml;ltige Weiterbildungs- und Entwicklungsm&ouml;glichkeiten sowie ein umfangreiches Gesundheitsprogramm f&uuml;r Besch&auml;ftigte wird Ihnen erm&ouml;glicht. Zudem gibt es vielf&auml;ltige Familienunterst&uuml;tzung und eine Kindertagesst&auml;tte mit Notfallkinderbetreuung. Dar&uuml;ber hinaus werden die &uuml;blichen sozialen Leistungen des &ouml;ffentlichen Dienstes geboten.
zum n&auml;chstm&ouml;glichen Termin
Stellenportal

Hier bewerben
Die MHH ist zertifizierte familiengerechte Hochschule und setzt sich f&uuml;r die F&ouml;rderung von Frauen im Berufsleben ein. Bewerbungen von Frauen sind besonders erw&uuml;nscht. Schwerbehinderte Bewerberinnen und Bewerber werden bei gleicher Qualifikation bevorzugt ber&uuml;cksichtigt.
Als universit&auml;re Spitzenklinik geh&ouml;ren wir zu den Besten. Wir sind f&uuml;hrend in Wissenschaft, Forschung und Lehre, ebenso in der Behandlung unserer Patientinnen und Patienten. Neben sinnvoller Arbeit f&uuml;r den Menschen bieten wir vor allem Raum f&uuml;r Engagement und Weiterentwicklungen. Wir sorgen f&uuml;r attraktive Arbeitsbedingungen und aktive Unterst&uuml;tzung f&uuml;r unsere Besch&auml;ftigten, sowie die Zugeh&ouml;rigkeit zu einem starken Team. Jeden Tag. "Jeden Tag f&uuml;r das Leben"

job_data.introduction: Die Aenova Group z&auml;hlt zu den weltweit f&uuml;hrenden Unternehmen der Pharma- und Healthcare-Branche. Das Servicespektrum der Gruppe umfasst die gesamte Wertsch&ouml;pfungskette der Entwicklung und Herstellung aller g&auml;ngigen Darreichungsformen und Produktgruppen im Bereich Arznei- und Nahrungserg&auml;nzungsmittel. Mit hohen Qualit&auml;tsstandards, innovativen Technologien und einer klaren Zukunftsausrichtung hat sich Aenova zu Europas Marktf&uuml;hrer im Business-to-Business entwickelt. Das Unternehmen, mit Sitz bei M&uuml;nchen, ist mit 15 Produktionsstandorten und mehreren Sales Offices weltweit in zehn L&auml;ndern vertreten. Mehr als 4.300 Mitarbeiter tragen zum Erfolg der Unternehmensgruppe bei.
job_data.responsibilities:
• Freigabeanalysen&nbsp;von Roh- und Hilfsstoffen, Zwischen- und Fertigprodukten
  • Durchf&uuml;hrung von Analysen mittels HPLC, UV-VIS, Titration, IR und nasschemischen Verfahren
  • Durchf&uuml;hrung&nbsp;von Analysen mittels Gaschromatographie
  • Anwendung von Arzneimittelmethoden nach EP, BP und USP-Monographie
  • GMP-gerechte Dokumentation von Analysenergebnissen
  • Kalibrierung und Wartung von Instrumenten
job_data.qualifications:
• Ausbildung zum Chemielaborant, Biolaborant, Umweltschutzlaborant, CTA, BTA, LTA, UMA (w/m/d) oder vergleichbar
  • Fundierte Kenntnisse der nasschemischen und instrumentellen Analytik
  • Bereitschaft zur Schichtarbeit (Fr&uuml;h- und Sp&auml;tschicht)
  • IT-Kenntnisse (MS Office) f&uuml;r die Anwendung der Laborsysteme
  • Verantwortungsbewusstsein, Sorgfalt, Teamf&auml;higkeit

Was bieten wir Ihnen?

  • Strukturierte Einarbeitung mit regelm&auml;&szlig;igem und offenen Austausch mit Ihrem Vorgesetzten um die Einarbeitung in die vielf&auml;ltigen Aufgaben zu erleichtern
  • Hervorragende Entwicklungschancen in einem dynamischen, wachsenden Unternehmen mit individuellen Weiterbildungsm&ouml;glichkeiten
  • Attraktive Verg&uuml;tung nach Haustarifvertrag, Urlaubsgeld, Leistungspr&auml;mie, umfassende Sozialleistungen wie betriebliche Altersversorgung, Kindergartenzusch&uuml;sse, Jubil&auml;umszahlungen, Mitarbeiterrabatte
  • Betriebliches Gesundheitsmanagement (Fitnessangebot, Beratung am Arbeitsplatz)
  • Kantine unter Ber&uuml;cksichtigung der Gesundheitsaspekte
job_data.we_offer:
• Strukturierte Einarbeitung mit regelm&auml;&szlig;igem und offenen Austausch mit Ihrem Vorgesetzten um die Einarbeitung in die vielf&auml;ltigen Aufgaben zu erleichtern
  • Hervorragende Entwicklungschancen in einem dynamischen, wachsenden Unternehmen mit individuellen Weiterbildungsm&ouml;glichkeiten
  • Attraktive Verg&uuml;tung nach Haustarifvertrag, Urlaubsgeld, Leistungspr&auml;mie, umfassende Sozialleistungen wie betriebliche Altersversorgung, Kindergartenzusch&uuml;sse, Jubil&auml;umszahlungen, Mitarbeiterrabatte
  • Betriebliches Gesundheitsmanagement (Fitnessangebot, Beratung am Arbeitsplatz)
  • Kantine unter Ber&uuml;cksichtigung der Gesundheitsaspekte
job_data.contact_data:
Gerne steht Ihnen die Personalabteilung&nbsp; unter +49 8683 895&nbsp;327 f&uuml;r Ihre Fragen&nbsp;zur Verf&uuml;gung.

Dragenopharm Apotheker P&uuml;schl GmbH,
Personalabteilung, G&ouml;llstr. 1, 84529 Tittmoning, Deutschland
